markdown:
| icon           = poe2 hat_serpent_crown icon.png
| description    = This is one of several plumed crowns worn by the Huana royalty of Neketaka, most recently Queen Onekaza II. This is a court crown, intended to be worn day-to-day, unlike some of the queen's more extravagant diplomatic wear. The crown's feathers identify it as the Serpent Crown, which the queen bore as a symbol of her authority as well as a subtle criticism of the various foreigners, rivals, and competing interests that recently beset her palace. According to Huana tradition, a monarch wears the Serpent Crown when she is surrounded by untrustworthy snakes. The symbolism was not lost on the queen.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Head
| item_type      = Hat
| item_category  = Accessory
| requirements   = 
| is_soulbound   = no
| is_unique      = yes
| value          = 610
| range          =

| item_bonuses   = Royal Plumage; Serpent's Strike

| internalname   = Head_U_Hat_Serpent_Crown
| location       = *Dropped by [Queen Onekaza II](/queenOnekazaIi/) if you kill her during the quest [The Final Maneuver](/theFinalManeuver/). Will also drop from [Prince Aruihi](/princeAruihi/) if you kill him instead.
| guid           =62187e22-f3ec-4e53-ae0c-1c55fea03fba
}}

This is a court crown, intended to be worn day-to-day, unlike some of the queen's more extravagant diplomatic wear. The crown's feathers identify it as the Serpent Crown, which the queen bore as a symbol of her authority as well as a subtle criticism of the various foreigners, rivals, and competing interests that recently beset her palace. According to Huana tradition, a monarch wears the Serpent Crown when she is surrounded by untrustworthy snakes. The symbolism was not lost on the queen.
